## DEFAULT\_APIDOCS\_GENERATION\_PATH variable

Default path for apidocs to be generated for loopback.io site

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
DEFAULT_APIDOCS_GENERATION_PATH = "docs/site/apidocs"
```
